signature.instructions: Given a user's natural language input describing their GPU compute needs, analyze the text to extract structured information. Your task is to identify and output the following parameters: reasoning behind the request, the primary use case (e.g., AI training, inference, data processing), required performance level (high, medium, low), any budget hints, specific technical requirements mentioned, GPU preferences, memory needs, storage needs, desired features, and urgency of deployment. Provide a clear and detailed response that captures all necessary elements for effective GPU configuration.

fields.description: The user's natural language input describing their compute needs

fields.prefix: Reasoning: Let's think step by step in order to

fields.description: Primary use case (e.g., AI training, inference, data processing, general compute)
Required performance (high, medium, low, enterprise, standard, lite)
Comma-separated list of specific technical requirements mentioned
Any specific GPU mentioned (e.g., H100, A100, T4)
Comma-separated list of specific features requested (e.g., Kubernetes, monitoring, backup)
